---

I would definitely say that my **FAVORITE** sport to watch of all time is: Football!

![football](https://operations.nfl.com/media/2948/the-ball-football.jpg?mode=max&width=995)


I've *really* enjoyed watching the game since I was in kindergarten :) and I usually try to make time to watch any game that I can! 

A funny story that I usually tell people is that I love football so much that I used to skip trick-or-treating as a kid to watch all the games on Sundays! I guess I always missed out on the good halloween candy, DARN!

## Hot Take

I know that there are a lot of people out there that are huge college football fans. The College Football Playoff is quite exciting and it is always a wonder to see what the selection committee will end up choosing. However, I am not the biggest fan of college football. I just feel like when a team loses one game, their season is automatically done with. Most of the schools don't even have a fair chance to begin with since they don't play in a tough enough conference. If you want to learn more about why I'm showing some disgust, here's a [link](https://www.ncaa.com/news/football/article/2024-02-20/how-college-football-playoff-works) to learn a bit more about the College Football Playoff process. 

If I had to rank the types of football in order: 

1. NFL

2. High School

3. College

## Favorite Team

My favorite football team of all-time is the Pittsburgh Steelers!! HERE WE GO! 

I definitely am a little biased in liking the Steelers, just because of how close in proximity they are to me. However, I feel like most Steeler players are hard-working and easy to root for come Sunday!

My favorite Steeler player of all time has to be Hines Ward. I try to replicate his attitude throughout my daily life as he always got up from every huge hit with a smile. He taught me that life is too short not to have fun with things. Don't be too serious everyone. 

![hines](data:image/webp;base64,)

Most importantly, Go Steelers!

Here's a link to buy your own [Terrible Towel](https://shop.steelers.com/pittsburgh-steelers-classic-terrible-towel?gad_source=1&gclid=CjwKCAiA3Na5BhAZEiwAzrfagPNvw9P797PnRDrlBpOenypeCsc55w2NeGRcBH3z0kjj4Dh1Htba9hoCH7MQAvD_BwE) today!
